title: Fail to design SAM reports from Service Management
content:
The capability of designing SAM compliance reports from Service Management isn't available.

Cause

A possible cause for this issue is that you haven't configured the SAM required parameters when installing the classic or containerized UD/UCMDB.

Solution

  • If you're using a classic UD/UCMDB, set the following parameters in the config.properties file. See Install UCMDB Gateway on Windows or Install UCMDB Gateway on Linux. 
    [sam]
protocol=https
host=
port=
  • If you're using a containerized UD/UCMDB, set the cmsgateway.deployment.sam.host parameter in your values.yaml file. See Service Management integration parameters.
